text: so first you seal half my firm and now
this you think I asked for this I don't
like it anymore than you I'm going to
tell you this one time stay out of my
case our kids have gone to school
together since first grade Valerie
begged Helen to get me to help her what
was I supposed to do I don't know turn
her down since you're not even a divorce
attorney well like you once did with me
she said she needed someone that she can
trust and I am fully capable of handling
this you mean that you realize Lester
needs her stand beside him at his trial
which is your opportunity to take my
client for everything that he's got it's
just a negotiation to
you I am trying to save an innocent
man's life wait you really believe he
didn't do it yeah I do so Valerie wants
to negotiate fine we'll see you at the
table don't think that I don't realize
what this really is someone betraying
their partner while pretending to be the
victim
Ted hold on there's something else we
need to talk about no Stuart there is
nothing else that we need to talk about
